title.narrative: REGULATION AND COORDINATION

description.narrative: National regulatory frameworks, standards, implementation guidelines, institutional coordination mechanisms, capacity building plans, accountability and enforcement frameworks for child protection in place by 2016., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection Systems, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: A child protection system established in 3 districts and documented to inform a national child protection system

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF GENDER CHILDREN AND SOCIAL WELFARE

Legal and policy framework related to violence, exploitation and abuse
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social welfare workforce systems strengthening (accreditation, staffing and supervision)

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National regulatory frameworks, standards, implementation guidelines, institutional coordination mechanisms, capacity buildingplans, accountability and enforcement frameworks for child protection in place by 2016.
Number of districts that have implemented 75% of their multi stakeholder child protection plan (2011:0, 2016:28)
